issue.title: Gas detection fails near wall (Urban Practice 1)

content.raw:
See [Release Notes](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/SubT%20Release%20Notes%20&%20Updates)

```
2020-01-18
...
Realigned the gas emitter location to fill the whole room
```

Thanks for the bug report!  This should be fixed on the newest docker image released.  (If you test locally using catkin, just clear out your `~/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models` directories and run again).
content.html:

Realigned the gas emitter location to fill the whole room

Thanks for the bug report! This should be fixed on the newest docker image released. (If you test locally using catkin, just clear out your ~/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models directories and run again).
